name: Coinest Dungeon
description:
Thanks for trying out my game! Made solo within a 10 day window for the Untitled Game Jam #40. This is my first finished project, made in Godot. Sadly by uploading to itch, there is a delay introduced in the audio effects.

Defend your hoard of coins against attackers!

WASD to move

Click or hold left mouse to attack

More info on start screen

Assets from itch.io used:

"Super Dialogue Audio Pack" by Dillon Becker
"DungeonTileset" by 0x72
"Flame Projectile" by Jam991

Other assets:
"nuvel-modern-sans-serif-font" by 177studio

Music and explosion sound by myself made in Bosca Ceoil.
